## Cross validation

frog_folds$splits[1:3]

## Splitting with rsample

```{r}
#| echo: true
set.seed(123) #for reproducibility
ctg_split <- initial_split(dt, prop = 0.8)
ctg_split
```

## Training set

## Stratification

```{r}
#| echo: true
set.seed(123) #for reproducibility
ctg_split_strat <- initial_split(dt, prop = 0.8 ,strata = fetal_health)
ctg_split_strat
```
